H0.text: where was the outlaw of josey wales filmed. Arizona

H1.text: where was the outlaw of josey wales filmed. New Mexico

H2.text: where was the outlaw of josey wales filmed. California

H3.text: where was the outlaw of josey wales filmed. Utah

A4.text: Cinematographer Bruce Surtees, James Fargo, and Fritz Manes scouted for locations and eventually found sites in Page, Arizona, Tucson, Arizona, Kanab, Utah, and Oroville, California even before they saw the final script.
